summary: This document appears to be a series of weekly signature sheets from a correctional facility, likely the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) where Jeffrey Epstein was held. The sheets list various departments and staff positions for sign-off, indicating routine administrative oversight within the prison system. keyFacts: The document consists of repetitive weekly signature sheets for a correctional facility, spanning pages 94-122 of a 208-page file.
The sheets list standard prison departments and staff positions (Warden, Captain, Lieutenants, Duty Officer, DHO, Health Services, etc.) for administrative sign-off.
The document is part of a larger file (EFTA00108571-EFTA00108584) and includes a footer referencing 'Red Book Solutions' and 'We make good managers better'.
No specific events, dates, or individuals related to the Epstein case are mentioned in this administrative fragment.
The document appears to be routine prison operational records, not directly containing case-related testimony or evidence.
